reviewText: This was a rather well done biography of Michelangelo, and, as it is said, the Artist and Man.  Well done and organized, and I found it interesting how a competition with Leonardo Da Vinci at one point developed, but was oddly never concluded. However, I did wish that this feature could have gone further in depth, with, for instance, his relationship with Raphael, and a discussion and examination of Michelangelo's architectural works... So very good, but merely that.
